body_html:
Thanks @junshi15 for noticing this commit.
Not sure I understand why you say BaseRemoteRendezvous is used in the case of local tensor transfer between GPU and CPU on the same worker.
This is a more detailed log of the all the occurences of affine1/biases in the last iteration in worker1. We can see the RdmaRemoteRendezvous has completed successfully from the PS.
I'm not so sure anymore this issue is even related to the Verbs code.

Thanks @junshi15 for noticing this commit.
Not sure I understand why you say BaseRemoteRendezvous is used in the case of local tensor transfer between GPU and CPU on the same worker.
[This](https://gist.github.com/shamoya/36beb1d093d4b95a523e27d4deda16ea) is a more detailed log of the all the occurences of affine1/biases in the last iteration in worker1. We can see the RdmaRemoteRendezvous has completed successfully from the PS.
I'm not so sure anymore this issue is even related to the Verbs code.
